title: Lavender Lady
description: Hester Godric's grandfather was in trade, but her stepmother had taught her to be a lady - before leaving Hester with four half-siblings to raise. The victim of a carriage accident lands in her home to recover, but does not reveal that he is the Earl of Alton. Hester learns his identity only when the whole family descends on London - and involves my lord in a variety of scrapes.
author: Carola Dunn
